select.if: SELECT g.gid, g.sku, g.sku_name, g.cover_image_uri, g.goods_specification, g.goods_unit FROM cus_customer c INNER JOIN gds_goods_price p ON c.store_id = p.store_id AND p.start_time < NOW() AND (p.end_time IS NULL OR p.end_time > NOW()) INNER JOIN gds_goods g ON p.gid = g.gid LEFT JOIN quick_order_relation q ON q.goods_sku = g.sku WHERE c.cus_id = #{userId} AND q.number = #{number}

SELECT g.gid, g.sku, g.sku_name, g.cover_image_uri, g.goods_specification, g.goods_unit FROM emp_employee e INNER JOIN gds_goods_price p ON e.store_id = p.store_id AND p.start_time < NOW() AND (p.end_time IS NULL OR p.end_time > NOW()) INNER JOIN gds_goods g ON p.gid = g.gid LEFT JOIN quick_order_relation q ON q.goods_sku = g.sku WHERE e.emp_id = #{userId} AND e.identity_type = #{identityType} AND q.number = #{number}
